org.mearvk

Class OrderedTestRunner

  • java.lang.Object
    • Runner
      • org.mearvk.OrderedTestRunner

  • public class OrderedTestRunner
extends Runner
    A runner that runs specially annotated (@ClassRunOrder, @MethodRunOrder) classes. This allows testers to specify ordering in their test suites.
    Author:
    Max Rupplin
    See Also:
    Licensing, code source, etc.
